comment: He is a graduate student so I don't expect him to be as skilled as a professor. I think he is ok, not strict but you also have to do your part by reading and attending classes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I signed up for a totally different professor and was passed off to this guy, who is currently a grad student. As you can probably tell by his name, English is not his first language, and I cannot stress how difficult this makes understanding him. He's not a good explainer, and will take points off later for things he told you were right in the lab
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS
